/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -O3 -g    CMakeFiles/ceres_customBundle.dir/ceresBundle.cpp.o  -o ceres_customBundle -rdynamic libBALProblem.so libParseCmd.so /usr/local/lib/libceres.a /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.3.3.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.3.3.1 -lglog -lgflags -lpthread -lspqr -ltbb -ltbbmalloc -lcholmod -lccolamd -lcamd -lcolamd -lamd -llapack -lf77blas -latlas -Wl,-Bstatic -lsuitesparseconfig -Wl,-Bdynamic -lrt /usr/local/lib/libmetis.so -lgomp -lpthread -lspqr -ltbb -ltbbmalloc -lcholmod -lccolamd -lcamd -lcolamd -lamd -llapack -lf77blas -latlas -Wl,-Bstatic -lsuitesparseconfig -Wl,-Bdynamic -lrt /usr/local/lib/libmetis.so -lgomp /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.3.3.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.3.3.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.3.3.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.3.3.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.3.3.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.3.3.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.3.3.1 -Wl,-rpath,/home/sicong/polar_ba/cmake-build-debug:/usr/local/lib
